content: Initially, as you start your journey, it isn't clear what Mind Cores do or where you can use them. However during Chapter 2 in Yellow Wind Ridge you will be able to start using them, providing you complete a questline.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core'.
The content is as follows:
Initially, as you start your journey, it isn't clear what Mind Cores do or where you can use them. However during Chapter 2 in Yellow Wind Ridge you will be able to start using them, providing you complete a questline.
